meaningMnemonic: This <radical>bamboo</radical> can be whittled into an <kanji>example</kanji> of anything. See, here's a <radical>car</radical>. Here's a <radical>snake</radical>. I can make so many examples just with bamboo.
readingMnemonic: One last <kanji>example</kanji> for you. Now I'm going to take this bamboo and whittle it into an example of <reading>Han</reading> (はん) Solo!
